ICR:RageStrike.NAME: Rage Strike
ICR:RageStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Increases by !M! when Bloodied.

ICR:AutoDefend.NAME: Auto Defend
ICR:AutoDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increases by !M! per channeled orb.

ICR:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
ICR:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage twice, or thrice when Bloodied.
